name: The Adventure of Rick: Grad School
name_original: The Adventure of Rick: Grad School
description:
My submission to GBJAM7. This game is about the life of young Rick when he was in grad school. 

This game is still under development. At the current state, the art assets are borrowed from Peter Milko's Grub's Adventure and GBStudio's sample project. Source code can be found here.
